sentences: Rika Izumi (泉 里香, Izumi Rika, born October 11, 1988) is a Japanese model, actress and singer.
After Izumi returned to the modeling world in 2008, she used both 泉里果 and 泉里香 as stage names; both are pronounced "Izumi Rika".
She has also modeled in magazines called Monthly De-View (Winter 2002–2003).
She had released a single in November 2003 for a song entitled "Koisuru Soldier" (Kanojo wa Ijiwaru
When she was accepted at Meiji University as a literature major in 2007 (the same university ex-PGSM castmate Kitagawa attended), she resumed her career.

The ban her former castmates had of posting photos of her was lifted; she was photographed with Sawai, Kitagawa, Mew Azama, and Ayaka Komatsu at a party celebrating Komatsu's twenty-second birthday, and Komatsu posted the photo on her blog on August 7, 2008.
She has been mentioned as being in the casts of three movies: The Go Master (2006), Clearness (2008), and Go Seigen ("Five Restrictions") (2008).
The Sun Music Brain bio lists a November 2007 movie with Izumi in the cast.
Rika has also done runway modeling since her 2008 return.
In 2011, she had a cameo in the movie Paradise Kiss in which she was reunited with her ex-PGSM castmate Kitagawa.
In 2013 she played the role of Akira Kazuraba (Kota's sister) in Kamen Rider Gaim.
